about_the_game:
Cain: Redemption or Revenge?

In a world devastated by a post-apocalyptic future, you take on the role of Cain, a man marked by a dark past. After committing the terrible sin of murdering his brother Abel, Cain was cursed by God with a visible mark on his skin. To hide this curse, he wraps himself in bandages, trying to escape the painful memories and guilt that haunt him. Now, Cain must face dark creatures and deadly dangers on a journey seeking redemption... or risk losing himself to his own darkness.

What Awaits You in This Epic Journey:

  • Intense 2D Platforming: Explore treacherous environments filled with lethal traps, challenging enemies, and platforms that will test your precision and reflexes.

  • Two Endings, One Choice: Your decisions will shape Cain’s destiny. Will you guide him toward forgiveness and redemption, or let him succumb to bitterness and a desire for revenge?

  • Deep and Reflective Storyline: Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative that explores themes of guilt, regret, and the search for redemption, inspired by biblical mythology.

  • Immersive Futuristic Atmosphere: Experience a detailed setting that blends advanced technology with apocalyptic landscapes, reflecting Cain’s internal struggle between light and darkness.

  • Mini-Games: After each level, put your skills to the test in challenging mini-games to collect Orbs (the game’s “coins”), inspired by the nostalgic classic Super Mario.

  • Game Extras: Replay unlocked levels, collect Orbs again, and listen to the game’s soundtrack in the Extras menu as you progress on your journey.

Will Cain find the peace he so desperately seeks, or will he be consumed by the weight of his past? The choice is yours. Prepare for an intense journey that will challenge not only your skills but also your morality, in a world where your choices can change everything.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS ou SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 ou equivalente
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU integrada com suporte a OpenGL 2.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Padrão ALSA ou PulseAudio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Pode exigir pacotes adicionais como libnss3 e libgconf-2-4
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS ou SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K ou equivalente
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 ou AMD RX 570 com drivers atualizados
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Padrão ALSA ou PulseAudio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Testado em sistemas com kernel Linux 5.15 ou superior

short_description: Carrying the weight of an unforgivable sin, the murder of his brother Abel, Cain wrapped his body in bandages to hide his guilt. In a devastated world, he faces relentless obstacles, and with each step, he moves closer to a choice: seek redemption or succumb to the hatred consuming him.
